summary: This mod adds several additional defences to Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod after a video i saw from Shadiversity on the defence of Solitude, it is not a big mod, it just adds some gates to seperate the barracks area from the other baileys. I also fixed the problem with the wall that was too high to function as a battlement.

The video by Shad:
[youtube]uMLfn9lNEp4[/youtube]

This mod does not make big changes but it is a nice addition if you want some immersion.
author: Kleis
